text: @TaxReformExpert @realDonaldTrump We have a terrible Governor here in Michigan. Worse than the one who poisoned the water in Flint. She is destroying the livelihood of millions here and put Covid-19 positive patients inside our nursing homes just like Andrew Cuomo did. Gretchen Whitmer, remember that name.
